trans-unit.source: Holds the name of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSetCollection" /> on the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 的名稱保留在工作流程上的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSetCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSetReference> class and set it to the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.PolicyActivity.RuleSetReference%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSetReference> 類別的新執行個體，並將其設定為 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.PolicyActivity.RuleSetReference%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the RuleActionTrackingEventSample SDK Sample from the SimplePolicyWorkflow.designer.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是 SimplePolicyWorkflow.designer.cs 檔案中＜RuleActionTrackingEventSample SDK＞範例的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [RuleActionTrackingEvent Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cea1192f-82e2-4c8a-acc0-5f8ed462de73).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[RuleActionTrackingEvent 範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cea1192f-82e2-4c8a-acc0-5f8ed462de73)。
